DOC.criteria: Participants complain irregular menstrual cycle past 12 month , forward postpone cycle 7 day . At least 2 cycle miss past 12 month , report menopause least 60 day . Reported relative perimenopausal symptom , e.g. , hot flash , insomnia , migraine , easy irritation , etc . Age 4050 year . Not accompanied condition need hormone therapy , e.g. , menopause surgery , active osteoporosis . Willing participate signing inform consent . Had regular menopausal cycle 3 month trial . Taking estrogen , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) , soy isoflavone , progesterone , Vitamin E black cohosh 4 week inclusion . receive chemoradiotherapy . Agnogenic vaginal bleeding . Coagulation defeat , take anticoagulant drug , warfarin , heparin , etc . Dermal disease , e.g. , eczema , psoriasis . Liver kidney failure . Uncontrollable hypertension , diabetes , thyroid disease . With diabetic neuropathy , malignant cancer mental disease ( include depression ) . Intend gestation , gestation period lactation period . Using sedative antianxiety drug . With smoke intemperance problem . Using cardiac pacemaker , joint prosthesis . Low compliance . Benign tumor breast . Family history breast cancer .
